attributes.action: Stop government cuts from Emergency Services
attributes.additional_details:
Since 2010 the government has been saving and taking money from our Emergency Services, it has been announced with week that Tyne and Wear will loose 131 Fire Fighters, 6 Fire Appliances and 3 Fire Stations.

This in turn reduces responce times and puts lives at risk, not only is it the Fire Bridge, but the Police and Ambulance Service, these are the people and the services we need the most and they need money to keep functioning properly.

This is not just for Tyne and Wear but it also effects Emergency Services throughout the country.

Please sign if you don't want cuts to be made to the Emergency Services in the country.
